name: d3-extras
description: Add extra fields to d3 plots

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_extras -o build/d3-extras.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-extras.js -c -m -o build/d3-extras.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-extras.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-extras.js build/d3-extras.min.js
